headline: Making your Bethel education more affordable.
teaser: We're committed to not letting cost stand in the way of your life-changing education, so we doubled the amount of Bethel funded scholarships and grants over the last few years to $32 million and reset tuition and aid at the seminary. Talk to your enrollment counselor to find out how financial aid can work for you.

headline: Really Making your Bethel education more affordable.
teaser: We're committed to not letting cost stand in the way of your life-changing education, so we doubled the amount of Bethel funded scholarships and grants over the last few years to $32 million and reset tuition and aid at the seminary. Talk to your enrollment counselor to find out how financial aid can work for you.

headline: We live our beliefs inside and outside the classroom.
teaser: Join a community of people who love to ask important questions, talk about their faith, and learn from each other’s perspectives.

headline: Practice because you love to.
teaser: At Bethel, we make the extra effort to be great. Because when you love what you do, it’s not work.
